messages.content: On Thursday 12 December, families in Rochester & Strood have a once-in-a-generation chance to transform our country so that no one is held back and no community left behind. I live and work in Rochester with my family so understand our area and will make Labour's policies and ambitions work for you.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Kick start a Green Industrial Revolution to tackle the climate emergency and create high skilled, high wage jobs.
Ensure everybody gets the care they need, with increased funding for the NHS; an end to privatisation and free prescriptions and personal social care for all.

Create opportunity for all and invest in a free National Education Service to provide free school meals to all primary school children and reduce class sizes to under 30 for all five, six and seven year olds.
Give parents the support they need by funding 30 hours of free childcare for all two to four year olds.
Stop Boris Johnson's disastrous, sell-out Brexit deal and give you the final say.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Labour can challenge the Conservatives here.

issues.brexitEurope: Stop Boris Johnson's disastrous, sell-out Brexit deal and give you the final say.
issues.economy: A decade of Conservative cuts has damaged our economy, our communities and driven our public services in Rochester & Strood to breaking point.
issues.education: Under the Tories, school budgets have been slashed and head teachers have had no choice other than to send begging letters home to parents asking for money.
issues.environment: Kick start a Green Industrial Revolution to tackle the climate emergency and create high skilled, high wage jobs.
issues.health: Our NHS has been pushed into crisis, GP numbers are falling and the waiting list for operations has reached a record 4.4 million.

community.content: Only Labour can challenge the Conservatives here.
